name: Lenz Caemmerer
goal: Lenz Caemmerer is a law firm focusing on media, technologiy and intelectual property, whose lawyers are experts in their fields. Lenz Caemmerer provides legal, commercial and policy advice to national, Europiean and internatinal clients
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Legal services to clients in the field of EU law, including in particular copyright law, publishing, music, audiovisual regualation and competition
customers: STM - International Association of Scientific, Technical, and Medical Publishers
